data.message: I don't remember hearing one peep about Obama dropping bombs on that hospital full of people. Not one peep about the Iran Nuke Deal. Nothing about the destabilization and destruction of Libya. Nothing about the rise of ISIS. Not one word about never ending the War on Terror as he'd promised. And not one fucking word on the $8 TRILLION added to the national debt.
